creator: sishkarov@gmail.com
text:
Default DocumentRoot is /apache/htdocs but another in documentation
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/core.html#documentroot

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
It is whatever path prefix you have installed httpd to, and that goes for all paths throughout httpd documentation, and for all platforms.

A certain amount of sense is a prerequisite for absorbing httpd's documentation, and this certainly falls within that expectation.
